description: definition of the groups for which statistics are provided. None of these are mandatory and can be used when convenient.

lactationNumberRangeMin.description: minimum number of lactations for the animals in the group.

lactationNumberRangeMax.description: maximum number of lactations for the animals in the group.

daysInMilkRangeMin.description: minimum number of days in milk for the animals in the group.

daysInMilkRangeMax.description: maximum number of days in milk for the animals in the group.

animalSetId.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this animal set.
